oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Key issue in nutrient recycling: Integration between crop and animal production - conclusion about BERAS-project
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seuri, Pentti
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Part of BERAS-project a more detailed analysis was made of nitrogen utilization on nine organic farms in Juva region. All the main nutrient flows were identified for the years 2002-2004.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Seuri, Pentti (2008) Key issue in nutrient recycling: Integration between crop and animal production - conclusion about BERAS-project. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 4 (3), p. 17.
